title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 5
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 5
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Dani Burger Stocks Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing her story "Junk Bonds Couldn't Care Less About Stock Market's Alarm Bells." David Wilson Stocks Editor Bloomberg News Discussing his "Stock of the Day" XPO Logistics (XPO). XPO Logistics Inc.'s shares rose to a record after Deutsche Bank said they may rise as much as 75 percent from last week's closing price. Analyst Amit Mehrotra wrote in a report that XPO might reach $90 a share as the company benefits from the growth of online retailing. His 12-month price estimate is $75, the highest among 16 analysts in a Bloomberg survey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
